languages.text:
"Мелодия оскалившихся мук,
Манящая, как рвущаяся плоть,
Сквозь сухожилий треск и кости стук
Зовет кровавый полог распороть.
За ним лежит чертог, где утлый хор
Застыл в мольбе о милости немой.
Руководит им плоти дирижер,
Их глотки сжав костлявою рукой".

traits.locale_text:
"Мелодия оскалившихся мук,
Манящая, как рвущаяся плоть,
Сквозь сухожилий треск и кости стук
Зовет полог кровавый распороть.
За ним лежит чертог, где утлый хор
Застыл в мольбе о милости немой.
Руководит им плоти дирижер,
Их глотки сжав костлявою рукой".

languages.text:
"A melody of snarling agony,
Beguiling now, by rending flesh bewyched,
Through sinew, bone, and grisly pageantry,
It calls the blood-soaked drape to come unstitched.
A haggard chorus in the hall behind,
Their flesh employed to serve the maestro's art.
No prayer for mercy slips from throats confined,
The baton sets the beat of every heart."
languages.original_text:
"Мелодия оскалившихся мук,

languages.text:
“充满苦痛的旋律，
诱惑听众撕开他们的肉体。
透过筋腱、血肉与白骨，
拉下那鲜血淋漓的帷幕。
在后面的厅堂之中，憔悴的合唱响彻，
大师需要他们的血肉，完成经典之作。
没人流露出渴望怜悯的神情，
指挥棒指引着每个人的心灵。”
languages.original_text:
"A melody of snarling agony,
Beguiling now, by rending flesh bewyched,
Through sinew, bone, and grisly pageantry,
It calls the blood-soaked drape to come unstitched.

languages.text:
«Una melodía de rugiente agonía
que cautiva sajando la carne embrujada,
cortando nervio, hueso y macabra fruslería,
para rasgar la cortina de sangre empapada.
Más allá, resuena el coro demacrado
cuya carne es para el maestro su lienzo
Ni una súplica de piedad escapa de su garganta sellada
mientras la batuta marca el ritmo de su aliento».
languages.original_text:
"A melody of snarling agony,
Beguiling now, by rending flesh bewyched,
Through sinew, bone, and grisly pageantry,
It calls the blood-soaked drape to come unstitched.
A haggard chorus in the hall behind,
Their flesh employed to serve the maestro's art.
No prayer for mercy slips from throats confined,
The baton sets the beat of every heart."

languages.text:
「唸るような苦悶の旋律
肉体を引き裂き、魅惑する
筋と骨、陰惨な劇を通して
血に濡れたカーテンを解こうと呼びかける。
背後の広間では聞くに堪えない合唱が
彼らの肉体は音楽家の芸術の小道具。
閉ざされた喉では、慈悲を求める祈りすらあげられず
バトンがすべての心臓の鼓動のリズムをとる」
languages.original_text:
"A melody of snarling agony,
Beguiling now, by rending flesh bewyched,
Through sinew, bone, and grisly pageantry,
It calls the blood-soaked drape to come unstitched.
A haggard chorus in the hall behind,
Their flesh employed to serve the maestro's art.
No prayer for mercy slips from throats confined,
The baton sets the beat of every heart."

languages.text:
"Ein Lied gequälter, schmerzvoller Klänge,
Verzaubert' Fleisch es betörend durchtrennt,
durch Sehnen, Knochen, blutig' Gepränge,
blutroten Vorhang zur Auflösung drängt.
Im Saal dahinter der hagere Chor,
Das Fleisch dient allein des Maestros Kunst.
Die Sänger tragen kein Gnadenfleh'n vor,
ihr Herzschlag hängt ab von des Taktstocks Gunst."
languages.original_text:
"A melody of snarling agony,
Beguiling now, by rending flesh bewyched,
Through sinew, bone, and grisly pageantry,
It calls the blood-soaked drape to come unstitched.
A haggard chorus in the hall behind,

The baton sets the beat of every heart."

languages.text:
« Un concert de râles mélodieux,
Séduisant, déchirant la chair ensorcelée,
Entre les nerfs, les os et le spectacle affreux,
Il pousse à se défaire le rideau ensanglanté.
Un chœur exténué attend en arrière,
Aidant de sa chair à exprimer l'art du maestro.
Des gorges confinées ne s'échappe aucune prière,
La baguette fait battre tous les cœurs à son tempo. »
languages.original_text:
"A melody of snarling agony,
Beguiling now, by rending flesh bewyched,
Through sinew, bone, and grisly pageantry,
It calls the blood-soaked drape to come unstitched.
A haggard chorus in the hall behind,
Their flesh employed to serve the maestro's art.
No prayer for mercy slips from throats confined,
The baton sets the beat of every heart."

languages.text:
"Hırıldayan bir ızdırabın melodisi,
şimdilerde kandırıyor büyülediği bedenleri,
Kas telleri, kemikler ve tüyler ürperten bir tantanayla
Kana bulanmış perdeleri söküyor itinayla.
Ardımızdaki salonda bezgin bir koronun sesidir duyulan,
Bedenleridir maestronun sanatında hizmete koyulan.
Mahkûm edilen o boğazlardan duyamazsın merhamet duasını,
Copların darbeleridir belirleyen her bir kalbin atışını."
languages.original_text:
"A melody of snarling agony,
